833730.name: Senalux Level Pack 4
833730.description:
The 4th Senalux Level Pack adds another 72 levels to the game. It also introduces a new flip mechanic which allows the use of non-symmetrical elements in new ways. On top of that, 4 optical components are added.

The RGB and CMY filters block different colors of light depending on the incoming direction and the 3- and 5-divieders split a beam into divisions different from multiples of two.
833730.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 泰语, 韩语
